/*	This file contains all banned IP's
 *
 *	To add an IP manually follow the below example for a single IP, an IP range
 *	or a subnet:
 *
 *		192.168.1.1
 *		192.168.1.1 - 192.168.1.100
 *		192.168.1.0
 *
 *	Autogenerated lines can have information about time of ban, profile id
 *	and the reason for the ban. Ex:
 *
 *		192.168.1.1 // 2007-10-10 12:34 | JohnD | Griefing and harrassing other players
 *
 */

// The following line is an example of a single IP ban. Remove the // to activate
// 192.168.1.1

// To ban a range of IP's you do like this:
// 192.168.1.1 - 192.168.1.100

// And finally, to ban a subnet do like this and every IP starting with 192.168 will be rejected
// 192.168.0.0
